title.native: The Last Ride of the Wolves
title.english: The Last Ride of the Wolves

synopsis.native: Pasquale organizza la sua ultima grande rapina ma non sa che questa non è l'unica rapina in atto.
synopsis.english: Pasquale, an old crook who lost his fortune to gambling, organizes his last big heist and reunites The Wolves, a gang of North-Italian fairground operators who moonlight as thieves. The robbery of a money truck - transporting 12 million euros in cash - could be a good pension for everybody, and secure the legacy of their old-school craftsmanship.
